summary: Adapted .claude/ system from Lean 4 theorem proving to stock Neovim configuration maintenance. Removed all Lean-specific components (commands, skills, agents, context, rules) and created comprehensive Neovim domain support with 17 context files, 2 specialized agents, 2 skill wrappers, and 1 rule file. Updated routing, documentation, and created extension guide for adding new domains.

artifacts.summary: 17 Neovim context files covering domain, patterns, standards, tools, and templates
Neovim research agent for plugin and configuration research
Neovim implementation agent for configuration changes
Thin wrapper skill for Neovim research
Thin wrapper skill for Neovim implementation
Auto-applied rules for Neovim Lua development
Guide for extending system with new domains
Implementation summary with full change list

completion_data.completion_summary: Transformed .claude/ system from Lean 4 theorem proving to stock Neovim configuration. Created 17 Neovim context files, 2 specialized agents, 2 skills, and neovim-lua rule. Updated CLAUDE.md, routing, and documentation. Added extension guide for new domains.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Complete rewrite of .claude/CLAUDE.md for Neovim focus, updated context/index.md with Neovim sections, updated skill-orchestrator routing, added neovim-lua.md rule, created docs/guides/adding-domains.md, updated copy-claude-directory.md

next_steps: Test the new system by creating a neovim-language task and running through research/plan/implement workflow
